class gaia::core::Scene

Detailed Description

Base class for showing dialog on screen.

A DialogBox is a small window that user can to make decision or enter additional information. It is not fill the screen.

The following example demonstrates how to use the DialogBox. 

  //Create your customize DialogBox
  class MyDialogBox : public DialogBox {
    private:
      Button* mpBtn1;
      Button* mpBtn2;
      LinearLayout* mpLayout;

    public:
      MyDialogBox(Page* page) : DialogBox(page), mpBtn1(NULL), mpBtn2(NULL), mpLayout(NULL) {
        mpBtn1 = new Button(page);
        mpBtn2 = new Button(page);
        mpLayout = new LinearLayout(page);
        if (mpLayout != NULL) {
          mpLayout->addWidget(mpBtn1);
          mpLayout->addWidget(mpBtn2);
        }
        swallow(mpLayout);
        //set DialogBox is cancelable
        setCancelable(true);
   };
   //Show your dialogbox in your Page.
   MyDialogBox* dialog = new MyDialogBpx(this);
   Scene* scene = getSceneSingleton();
   if (scene) {
     int Dialog_ID = scene->attachDialog(dialog);
     scene->showDialog(Dialog_ID);
   }

Member Function Documentation

void gaia::ui::DialogBox::cancel ( )

Cancel the DialogBox.

This is essentially the same as calling dismiss(), but it will also call IDialogOnCancelListener if registered.

void gaia::ui::DialogBox::disableDim ( )

Disable the background dim effect.

Default DialogBox style is enabled.

void gaia::ui::DialogBox::dismiss ( )

Dismiss this DialogBox, removing it from the screen.

Note that you should not do cleanup when the DialogBox is dismissed, instead implement that in onStop().

void gaia::ui::DialogBox::enableKeyguardDialog ( bool  enable)

Enable DialogBox that the keyguard shows.

Default DialogBox is not keyguard type. Trigger the keyguard type of DialogBox before setupBox called.

Parameters:
enableIf true, trigger the keyguard tye of DialogBox and else versa.
gaia::core::Widget* gaia::ui::DialogBox::findWidgetById ( int32_t  id)

Finds a view that was identified by the id attribute from the XML that was processed in onStart.

Parameters:
idthe identifier of the widget to find
Returns:
The widget if found or null otherwise.

Get the status of the DialogBox is currently showing or not.

virtual void gaia::ui::DialogBox::setCancelable ( bool  cancelable) [virtual]

Set the DialogBox could cancel or not.

Default DialogBox is non-cancelable.

Parameters:
cancelabletrue for the DialogBox could cancelable, and else versa.

Reimplemented in gaia::ui::AlertBox.

void gaia::ui::DialogBox::setSoftInputMode ( int32_t  mode)

Set DialogBox will pan or resize when soft input showing.

Parameters:
modeThe DialogBox adjustment option for soft input showing. It could be Scene::SOFT_INPUT_ADJUST_UNSPECIFIED, Scene::SOFT_INPUT_ADJUST_RESIZE or Scene::SOFT_INPUT_ADJUST_PAN.
void gaia::ui::DialogBox::setupBox ( )

When finishing all DialogBox settings such as register listener, set DialogBox information or set the content of DialogBox, the DialogBox have to trigger these settings before show.

void gaia::ui::DialogBox::show ( )

Start the DialogBox and display it on screen.

void gaia::ui::DialogBox::swallow ( gaia::core::Widget *  widget)

Swallow the customized UI to DialogBox.

Parameters:
widgetThe customized ui that would show in the DialogBox.
